WorkItem.Description:
Please look at my errors when i'm executing your script on web-server: (on my local server Denver - all is ok)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Warning: tempnam() [function.tempnam]: open_basedir restriction in effect. File(/tmp) is not within the allowed path(s): (/var/www/travelbook/data:.) in /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5/Worksheet.php on line 355
 
Warning: fopen() [function.fopen]: Filename cannot be empty in /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5/Worksheet.php on line 356
 
Warning: is_dir() [function.is-dir]: open_basedir restriction in effect. File(/tmp) is not within the allowed path(s): (/var/www/travelbook/data:.) in /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php on line 80
 
Warning: tempnam() [function.tempnam]: open_basedir restriction in effect. File() is not within the allowed path(s): (/var/www/travelbook/data:.) in /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php on line 95
 
Warning: fopen() [function.fopen]: Filename cannot be empty in /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php on line 96
 
Fatal error: Uncaught exception 'Exception' with message 'Can't create temporary file' in /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php:98 Stack trace: #0 /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Writer/Excel5.php(198): PHPExcel_Shared_OLE_PPS_File->init() #1 /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/price2excel.php(241): PHPExcel_Writer_Excel5->save('php://output') #2 {main} thrown in /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/OLE/OLE_File.php on line 98
WorkItem.Summary: I can't execute your script! Pls Help me!

Comments.Message:
Have you got again your problem ?

Which version of PHPExcel do you use ?
May be duplicate of Work item 11692 - File->sys_get_temp_dir() can fail in safe mode, which was fixed a year ago in version 1.7.3

Just now updated to last version 1.7.6. And only one error is showed:

Warning: realpath() [function.realpath]: open_basedir restriction in effect. File(/tmp) is not within the allowed path(s): (/var/www/travelbook/data:.) in /var/www/travelbook/data/www/travelbook.com.ua/2c/PhpExcel/Classes/PHPExcel/Shared/File.php on line 136
The problem is solved. Thanks to everyone!
